dcterms:creator: D. E. Olivares
A. Bahmanyar
S. Jamali
A. Estebsari
E. Bompard
dcterms:description: The Potsdam microgrid dataset includes voltage measurements from a microgrid system with 13 nodes and various fault scenarios. The data is collected via real-time simulation using Opal-RT, and it is used for training models for fault detection, classification, and location.
dcterms:title: Potsdam microgrid dataset
